title: Bigstore e-commerce platform
description: Averaging at 180 users per day, Bigstore is a hyperlocal model ecommerce platform.

body.raw:
<Image
  src="/projects/bigstore/floating.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
/>

<Image
  src="/projects/bigstore/cities.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="This are the cities we serve in East Africa."
/>

<Image
  src="/projects/bigstore/home.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Sneak peek of the store home page "
/>
